attributes.comment:
I think that the immigrants who come to the U.S.A have enough to deal with just
to try to file papers to become a legal citizen of the U.S.A. The fees are already
high enough and hard enough to pay for most of the immigrants that are in the
U.S.A now. My vote would be to leave the prices as they are. We should help the
people who are here, not deport them and make things harder for them than they
already are. Most immigrants or aliens who come to the U.S. come to "The Land
of the Free" and to get help and help support their families. The U.S.A has a good
government system in helping people in need, such as W.I.C program and Food
stamps, Medical, etc., in most other countries they don't have any help, and that
is why so many are coming to the U.S.A.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Nicole
